'''Bathhouse Manjuu''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe can be bought from [[Shimura Kanbei]] in [[Inazuma City]], [[Narukami Island]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Bathhouse Manjuu restores '''70'''/'''85'''/'''100''' [[Stamina]] with a 300-second cooldown. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Yumemizuki Mizuki|Dreams of Healing}}
